DESCRIPTIONS: A gremlin is madly shuffling cards on a table. This monster seems to be a harmless one. You approach him out of curiosity.
" #bCombine two cards and get a more powerful card! NL Are you ready? Let's start!"
You complete the gremlin's game and look up. NL He disappeared? NL In front of you is a card same as you just played.
You take the card and continue the journey.
You don't trust the gremlin and leave without taking the card.
